ygData.subject: Re: Boots, time, and mana song
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh, I was thinking the same thing.  Also has anyone noticed that two boats seem to often be almost together.  As in boat 1 arrives in freeport, departs, then
ygData.messageBody:
Heh, I was thinking the same thing. Also has anyone noticed that two
boats seem to often be almost together. As in boat 1 arrives in
freeport, departs, then less than 10 min later boat 2 arrives, departs,
leaving about 30 min before boat 1 comes back again?

"Kimes, Dean W." wrote:
>
> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
> Only Verant would think boats shouldn't run on a set schedule! Too
> convenient? I wish there was some way I could set the RL time schedule of
> whoever dreamed this up at Verant.
>
> Brad: "Where's my dinner, it shoulda been ready an hour ago!"
> Chef: "Oh, you know it would be too convenient if you knew exactly
> when your dinner would arrive so we made it random. You missed
> it by 3 minutes, come back tomorrow."
>
> Kit
--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
